actions.name: Seaweed
actions.description: Effect: The user's Grass-Type attacks are one step more effective against Fire-Type creatures. If the user is Grass-Type, they resist Fire-Type attacks one step further.

system.description: Effect: The user's Grass-Type attacks are one step more effective against Fire-Type creatures. If the user is Grass-Type, they resist Fire-Type attacks one step further.
